rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 2 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 1:41 PM, 09 June 2025(Monday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Tarlac, Bataan, Pampanga, Nueva Ecija, Bulacan, Quezon, Laguna, Batangas and Cavite within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Zambales(Santa Cruz, Candelaria, Masinloc), Metro Manila(Paranaque, Muntinlupa, Taguig, Pateros, Pasig, Makati, Pasay) and Rizal(Rodriguez, Antipolo) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
